description: Configure how the calls are sent to a hold queue when all operators are busy on other calls.

allow_queuing.description: Whether or not send callers to a hold queue, if all operators are busy on other calls. Default is False.

max_hold_count.description: If all operators are busy on other calls, send callers to a hold queue. This is to specify your queue size. Choose from 1-50. Default is 50.

max_hold_seconds.description: Maximum queue wait time in seconds. Choose from 30s to 18000s (3 hours). Default is 900s (15 min).
